name: crDroid
notes:
• Magicxavi is currently maintaining YAAP HOMEMADE and PixelMagic ALPHAGENE r10. You should switch and/or use that ROM instead.
  • Android 10, with android 11 firmware.
  • Thanks to all my contributors :)
  • Bugs: After first boot need to reboot phone, otherwise after locking device display wont turn on, until reboot, Portrait and night mode in miui camera not working, Maybe more
